TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ObsoleteAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ObsoleteAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ObsoleteAttribute sealed : Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Enum | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Event | System.AttributeTargets.Interface | System.AttributeTargets.Delegate, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 標記不再使用的程式項目。

span.span: Marks the program elements that are no longer in use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 適用於所有的程式項目，但組件、 模組、 參數和傳回值。 is applicable to all program elements except assemblies, modules, parameters, and return values. 標記為過時的項目，會通知使用者此項目會在未來移除產品的版本。Marking an element as obsolete informs users that the element will be removed in future versions of the product. 類別包含兩個屬性：The class includes two properties: - 。. 將字串指派到屬性目標的程式碼中使用時，屬性由編譯器發出。The string assigned to the property is emitted by the compiler when the attribute target is used in code. 字串應該注意，屬性目標已經過時，可能的話，請提供一些因應措施或程式設計替代方式。The string should note that the attribute target is obsolete and, if possible, provide some workaround or programmatic alternative. - 。. 這是布林值，表示編譯器是否使用屬性應該讓它發出錯誤 (是`true`) 或 警告 (是`false`)。This is a Boolean value that indicates to the compiler whether using the attribute should cause it to emit an error ( is `true`) or a warning ( is `false`). 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 應用程式 Apps 當您建立 Windows 中繼資料庫 （.winmd 檔案），匯出為屬性並[Windows.Foundation.Metadata.DeprecatedAttribute](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecatedattribute.aspx)屬性如果唯一是在原始程式碼中出現。When you create a Windows Metadata library (.winmd file), the is exported as both the attribute and the [Windows.Foundation.Metadata.DeprecatedAttribute](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecatedattribute.aspx) attribute if only the is present in source code. 轉換為`DeprecatedAttribute`，如下所示：The is transformed to the `DeprecatedAttribute` as follows: - 如果`message`並`error`引數存在，兩者都`message`指派給`DeprecatedAttribute``message`引數。If the `message` and `error` arguments are both present, `message` is assigned to the `DeprecatedAttribute` `message` argument. 錯誤值`true`對應至[DeprecationType.Remove](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecationtype.aspx)，以及`error`的值`false`對應至[DeprecationType.Deprecate](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecationtype.aspx)。An error value of `true` maps to [DeprecationType.Remove](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecationtype.aspx), and an `error` value of `false` maps to [DeprecationType.Deprecate](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecationtype.aspx). - 如果`message`中未提供引數，在其預設值`DeprecatedAttribute`是 「*element_name*已被取代 」，其中*element_name*為目標的名稱套用屬性的程式項目。If the `message` argument is not supplied in the , its default value in the `DeprecatedAttribute` is "*element_name* is deprecated", where *element_name* is the name of the target program element to which the attribute is applied. - 如果`error`引數不存在於，在其預設值`DeprecatedAttribute`是[DeprecationType.Deprecate](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecationtype.aspx)。If the `error` argument is not present in the , its default value in the `DeprecatedAttribute` is [DeprecationType.Deprecate](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecationtype.aspx). > [!IMPORTANT] > 直接套用[Windows.Foundation.Metadata.DeprecatedAttribute](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecatedattribute.aspx)不建議對 managed 程式碼的屬性，因為這個匯出中，會自動進行。Directly applying the [Windows.Foundation.Metadata.DeprecatedAttribute](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/windows.foundation.metadata.deprecatedattribute.aspx) attribute to managed code is not recommended, because this export occurs automatically. ## Examples 下列範例會定義類別，其中包含屬性和方法標記著屬性。The following example defines a class that contains a property and a method that are marked with the attribute. 存取的值`OldProperty`屬性中的程式碼會產生編譯器警告，但呼叫`CallOldMethod`方法會產生編譯器錯誤。Accessing the value of the `OldProperty` property in code generates a compiler warning, but calling the `CallOldMethod` method generates a compiler error. 此範例也示範當您嘗試將原始程式碼編譯會產生輸出。The example also shows the output that results when you attempt to compile the source code. [!code-csharp[ObsoleteAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObsoleteAttribute/CS/obsoleteattributeex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObsoleteAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObsoleteAttribute/vb/obsoleteattributeex1.vb#1)]

span.span: if the obsolete element usage is considered an error; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會定義包含標記為過時的兩個成員的類別。The following example defines a class that contains two members marked as obsolete. 首先，一個名為屬性`OldProperty`，如果呼叫會產生編譯器警告。The first, a property named `OldProperty`, produces a compiler warning if it is called. 第二個、 一個名為方法`CallOldMethod`，會產生編譯器錯誤。The second, a method named `CallOldMethod`, produces a compiler error. 此範例使用反映來取得相關資訊屬性套用至型別的成員，並顯示的值及其和屬性。The example uses reflection to get information about the attributes applied to members of the type and displays the values of their and properties. [!code-csharp[System.ObsoleteAttribute.Message#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.obsoleteattribute.message/cs/obsoleteattribute_message.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ObsoleteAttribute.Message#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.obsoleteattribute.message/vb/obsoleteattribute_message.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得運算訊息，包含其他程式項目的說明。

span.span: Gets the workaround message, including a description of the alternative program elements.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會定義包含標記為過時的兩個成員的類別。The following example defines a class that contains two members marked as obsolete. 首先，一個名為屬性`OldProperty`，如果呼叫會產生編譯器警告。The first, a property named `OldProperty`, produces a compiler warning if it is called. 第二個、 一個名為方法`CallOldMethod`，會產生編譯器錯誤。The second, a method named `CallOldMethod`, produces a compiler error. 此範例使用反映來取得相關資訊屬性套用至型別的成員，並顯示的值及其和屬性。The example uses reflection to get information about the attributes applied to members of the type and displays the values of their and properties. [!code-csharp[System.ObsoleteAttribute.Message#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.obsoleteattribute.message/cs/obsoleteattribute_message.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ObsoleteAttribute.Message#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.obsoleteattribute.message/vb/obsoleteattribute_message.vb#1)]
